name: War Brave Sniper: Snow Mountai
description:
War Brave Sniper: Snow Mountain is a thrilling action FPS Mountain Sniper Game with real-life 3D graphics and ambient sound effects. The game gives an exciting experience to complete the mission. Hold your breath, at Snow Mountain, Desert, Forest,Rural. In a limited time,use your limited ammo rationally.
Features:
- real environment climate
- A lot of powerful weapons and equipment
- Realistic sniper gun shooting effect
- Realistic 3D graphics
- High-quality sniper experience
- challenging mission
